thread.title: Mike Ilitch funeral: Private service, public tribute to follow

title: Mike Ilitch funeral: Private service, public tribute to follow
text:
Mike Ilitch funeral: Private service, public tribute to follow A public memorial for Mike Ilitch is in the planning stages but tributes are suggested for 3 charities Post to Facebook Mike Ilitch funeral: Private service, public tribute to follow A public memorial for Mike Ilitch is in the planning stages but tributes are suggested for 3 charities  //on.freep.com/2kYI1N7   Mike Ilitch funeral: Private service, public tribute to follow Detroit Free Press staff 7:48 p.m. ET Feb. 10, 2017 Buy Photo Mike Ilitch's Red Wings are gaining in value. (Photo: Ryan Garza/Detroit Free Press) Buy Photo 1 CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Funeral services will be private for pizza mogul and sports magnate Mike Ilitch, 87, who died Friday. 
A public memorial service is being planned and details will be announced as soon as they are finalized, the Ilitch companies said in a statement. 
Ilitch owned Little Caesars Pizza, the Detroit Tigers and Detroit Red Wings, among a host of other ventures. 
In lieu of flowers, the Ilitch family asks that donations be made to:
